name: BestDungeonCrawlOfTheAllTimes
description:
My first game made for term paper in 2020-2021
-
Be carefull! loud music
-
Now i want to remake this game


You are a despot, but your reign has come to an end, an angry mob is already at the gate, take as much as you can with you!
-
Pixel art, three types of enemies and music from freesound.org!
